name: My Password Wallet
description: How many passwords do you have to remember ? Now every site requires a login and password, and often using the same password , or are stored in files that are not protected . Everything is discouraged by all operator safety , lose a password or a device means to risk losing important information (email , bank account , etc. )  With MyPassword solve everything . MyPassword is an encrypted wallet for your password.  Set a password to access all your passwords. The database is encrypted with AES -256 ( maximum security that you can have on a smartphone ) , even if you lose the device will not be able to recover your password.  With the icon in your notification bar can instantly call MyPassword and with a click to copy your login and password. MyPassword creates two notifications in your notification bar where it can be copied by selecting the login and password to the clipboard and copy them where you need them . In this way you can have all your different passwords increasing your safety .  You have many passwords to enter ! There were no problems , you can import and export your passwords in xls sheet .  You have multiple devices ! There are no problems ! Sharing with DropBox if activated allows you to make your database ENCRYPTED of MyPassword available to all your devices.  This version has the limitation of handling up to a maximum of 10 Password . If you want to remove this limitation and advertising you can buy the My Password PRO KEY, which is the key that removes the ads and removes the limitation on the number of passwords .  Here you can find the guide: http://goo.gl/Se4zRL  For any information send an email to drdsoftwareapps@gmail.com
